snippet: A huge cash advantage and a shift to the ideological right were not enough to protect Representative Cliff Stearns of Florida from anti-incumbent sentiment. He lost his bid for a 13th term to a political newcomer, Ted Yoho.
abstract: A huge cash advantage and a shift to the ideological right were not enough to protect Representative Cliff Stearns of Florida from anti-incumbent sentiment. He lost his bid for a 13th term to a political newcomer, Ted Yoho.

headline.main: Veterinarian Surprises Florida's Stearns in Republican Primary
